channel.title: Devoxx on Archive of FeedHenry Developer Blog 2012-2016
channel.description: Recent content in Devoxx on Archive of FeedHenry Developer Blog 2012-2016

item.title: The FeedHenry & Red Hat Devoxx Keynote Demo Team explains it all
item.description:
It was a real pleasure to see how well the Red Hat keynote at Devoxx went in Antwerp recently.

We don’t have a video of that yet, but Markus Eisele got the band back together for an encore on Google Hangouts last week.

The guys explain all of the tech behind the demo and show how FeedHenry, JBoss Fuse, xPaaS on OpenShift, and AeroGear/Unified Push worked beautifully together to deliver a fun demo.
